txt.en: Sundered in battles long ago between Angmar and the Zhélruka, Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire looms over Câr Bronach like a twisted, skeletal talon. Within the tower's walls, Zhélruka who have been captured by the Angmarim are forced to toil away on the shrouded machinery. These Zhélruka must be rescued.
Rescue Zhélruka Warriors at Tûr Fúar
Rescue Zhélruka Warriors at Tûr Fúar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sundered in battles long ago between Angmar and the Zhélruka, Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire looms over Câr Bronach like a twisted, skeletal talon.
Rescued Zhélruka Warriors at Tûr Fúar ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire, can be found in central Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should rescue Zhélruka Warriors at Tûr Fúar.
